revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #24 Lonme |image = [[File:Hondew.png]] |caption = Cette Baie plutôt rare incarne une certaine idée du luxe, c'est pourquoi on a l'habitude de l'offrir en cadeau. |growtime = 3h 0m 0s |harvest = 23 berries |replant = 20% |mutation = 0,04% |points = 2 000 |flavor =
*10 épicée *10 sèche *0 sucrée *10 amère *0 acide }} '''Lonme''' est un type de [[Berries/fr|Baie]] qui peut être plantée dans la [[Farm/fr|Ferme]]. Elle s'obtient en entourant une parcelle vide avec exactement 15 points de saveur épicée, sèche et amère, ainsi que 0 points de toute autre saveur. Les baies [[Figy/fr|Figuy]], [[Wiki/fr|Wiki]] et [[Aguav/fr|Gowav]] doivent avoir été débloquées afin d'obtenir cette baie. == Tables de croissance == === Stades de croissance === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Pousse !! Arbuste !! Fleuri !! Mûr |- ! Temps écoulé depuis plantation | 16 mins 40 secs || 33 mins 20 secs || 1 heure 23 mins 20 secs || 3 heures - 6 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:HondewTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:HondewTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:HondewTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 3 hours -
6 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 2 hours -
4 hours || 24 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 1 hour 20 mins -
2 hours 40 mins || 16 mulch |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Hondew_Flow_Chart.png|250px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Hondew berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] |- | [[File:Wiki.png|30px]]
[[Wiki]] || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] |- | [[File:Wiki.png|30px]]
[[Wiki]] || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Wiki.png|30px]]
[[Wiki]] || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] |- style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || || || || |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] |- | [[File:Wiki.png|30px]]
[[Wiki]] || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Wiki.png|30px]]
[[Wiki]] || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Wiki]] || - || - || - |- | [[Figy]] || 5 mins 50 secs until ripe || 3 mins 47 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- | [[Aguav]] || 5 mins 50 secs until ripe || 3 mins 47 secs until ripe || Not Practical |}
Note: Figy and Aguav have equivalent growth times.

*10 épicée *10 sèche *0 sucrée *10 amère *0 acide }}
'''Hondew''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with exactly 15 points of spicy, dry and bitter and 0 points of all other flavours. The [[Figy]], [[Wiki]] and [[Aguav]] berries must be unlocked to obtain this berry.

{{Infobox Berry |name = #24 Hondew |image = [[File:Hondew.png]] |caption = This somewhat-rare Berry projects an image of luxury, so it is favored as a gift item. |growtime = 3h 0m 0s |harvest = 23 berries |replant = 20% |mutation = 0.04% |points = 2,000 |flavor =
*10 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }}
'''Hondew''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with exactly 15 points of spicy, dry and bitter and 0 points of all other flavours. The [[Figy]], [[Wiki]] and [[Aguav]] berries must be unlocked to obtain this berry.
